mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM tb_alarm_info WHERE 1=1 AND ai_webdir = 'alarm21' ) AS alarm1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ac_webdir, ac_webclass, COUNT(*) AS ac_count FROM tb_alarm_cmt WHERE ac_webdir = 'alarm21' GROUP BY ac_webdir, ac_webclass ) AS alarm_cmt ON alarm1.ai_webdir = alarm_cmt.ac_webdir AND alarm1.ai_webclass = alarm_cmt.ac_webclass

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM tb_alarm_info WHERE 1=1 AND ai_webdir = 'alarm22' ) AS alarm1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ac_webdir, ac_webclass, COUNT(*) AS ac_count FROM tb_alarm_cmt WHERE ac_webdir = 'alarm22' GROUP BY ac_webdir, ac_webclass ) AS alarm_cmt ON alarm1.ai_webdir = alarm_cmt.ac_webdir AND alarm1.ai_webclass = alarm_cmt.ac_webclass

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM tb_alarm_info WHERE 1=1 AND ai_webdir = #{ai_webdir} AND ai_webclass = #{ai_webclass} ) AS alarm_info LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tb_alarm_cmt WHERE 1=1 AND ac_webdir = #{ai_webdir} AND ac_webclass = #{ai_webclass} AND ac_yn = 'Y' ) AS alarm_cmt ON alarm_info.ai_webdir = alarm_cmt.ac_webdir AND alarm_info.ai_webclass = alarm_cmt.ac_webclass ) AS aa ORDER BY ac_regtime DESC LIMIT 1
